synopsis.text: Alba Alba, a special combat team disguised as a school club, is formed by Negi Springfield, the young prodigy, after an eventful school life. The team, consisting of his classmates and guided by Evangeline A.K. McDowell, is determined to venture into the Magus world in search of Negi's missing father, Nagi Springfield. The team's mission is to uncover any information related to Nagi, who is believed to be alive. The OVA episodes, bundled with the limited edition of the manga volumes 23-25, cover chapters 176 to 183, showcasing Alba Alba's thrilling adventures and rigorous training, including trips to the beach and hot springs. As they prepare to depart for Mundus Magicus, they must first face challenges from other classmates eager to join and deal with Negi's jealous childhood friend, Anya. Will Negi and Alba Alba successfully make it to Wales and find Nagi? Join them in this magical journey to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
